items.name: a11y
items.title: A11y Utilities
items.description: Accessibility utilities for mapping aria attributes and roles.

items.name: alert
items.title: Alert
items.description: Alert container with title and description subcomponents.

items.name: aspect-ratio
items.title: Aspect Ratio
items.description: Maintains aspect ratio of children content. Uses CSS aspect-ratio on web, layout measurement on native.

items.name: avatar
items.title: Avatar
items.description: Avatar with image loading states and fallback initials.

items.name: badge
items.title: Badge
items.description: Badge component with default, secondary, destructive, and outline variants.

items.name: breadcrumb
items.title: Breadcrumb
items.description: Presentational breadcrumb navigation component. Uses Pressable with role=link and aria-current. Consumer must handle navigation via onItemPress.

items.name: button
items.title: Button
items.description: Button component with variants and pressed/disabled/loading states.

items.name: button-group
items.title: Button Group
items.description: Groups related buttons together with automatic border radius handling and optional separators. Supports horizontal/vertical orientation.

items.name: card
items.title: Card
items.description: Card container and subcomponents.

items.name: checkbox
items.title: Checkbox
items.description: A checkbox input with support for controlled/uncontrolled state, indeterminate state, and web accessibility.

items.name: collapsible
items.title: Collapsible
items.description: An interactive component which expands/collapses content with animated height transitions. Single-item accordion pattern.

items.name: empty
items.title: Empty
items.description: Empty state component with icon, title, description, and action slots for displaying placeholder content in lists and views.

items.name: field
items.title: Field
items.description: High-level presentational field wrapper combining label, control, description, and error messages. Built on Form Core components.

items.name: focus
items.title: Focus
items.description: Focus primitive for trapping and restoring focus.

items.name: form-core
items.title: Form Core
items.description: Presentational form components for consistent layout, labels, descriptions, and error display. No form state management. Use with form libraries.

items.name: form-rhf
items.title: Form RHF
items.description: React Hook Form integration helpers with typed wrappers. Provides FormRHFProvider and FormRHFField for seamless form handling.

items.name: form-tsf
items.title: Form TSF
items.description: TanStack Form integration helpers. Provides wrappers for @tanstack/react-form.

items.name: input-group
items.title: Input Group
items.description: Composable input group with text addons, icons, and button attachments. Layout wrapper for enhancing inputs.

items.name: item
items.title: Item
items.description: Generic item container with spacing variants. FormItem-like wrapper for vertically stacked items in forms or lists.

items.name: kbd
items.title: Kbd
items.description: Keyboard shortcut display component with monospace styling. Supports modifier key symbols and multiple sizes.

items.name: label
items.title: Label
items.description: Form label component with disabled state styling. Note: React Native does not support htmlFor or click-to-focus behavior.

items.name: native-select
items.title: Native Select
items.description: Native picker component using platform-specific select UI. iOS: bottom sheet, Android: dropdown/dialog, Web: HTML select.

items.name: overlay
items.title: Overlay
items.description: Dismiss layer and scrim/backdrop primitive for overlays.

items.name: pagination
items.title: Pagination
items.description: Pagination component for navigating through pages of data. Presentational component that requires consumer to wire to data source/router.

items.name: popover
items.title: Popover
items.description: Displays rich content in a portal, triggered by a button.

items.name: portal
items.title: Portal
items.description: Portal provider and host primitives for overlays.

items.name: positioning
items.title: Positioning
items.description: Positioning primitive for floating content with anchor measurement, placement, and collision handling.

items.name: press
items.title: Press Utilities
items.description: Utilities for handling press interactions and event composition.

items.name: progress
items.title: Progress
items.description: Progress bar with determinate and indeterminate modes.

items.name: radio-group
items.title: Radio Group
items.description: A set of checkable buttons—known as radio buttons—where no more than one of the buttons can be checked at a time.

items.name: roving-focus
items.title: Roving Focus
items.description: Roving Focus primitive for managing focus in a list or grid.

items.name: scroll-area
items.title: Scroll Area
items.description: A styled ScrollView wrapper. On web, scrollbars can be styled with CSS. On native, uses platform defaults.

items.name: scroll-lock
items.title: Scroll Lock
items.description: Scroll Lock primitive for preventing body scroll on web.

items.name: separator
items.title: Separator
items.description: Horizontal or vertical separator line.

items.name: skeleton
items.title: Skeleton
items.description: Loading skeleton with optional shimmer animation.

items.name: sonner
items.title: Sonner
items.description: An opinionated toast component for React Native.

items.name: spinner
items.title: Spinner
items.description: Activity indicator wrapper.

items.name: switch
items.title: Switch
items.description: A toggle switch with animated knob transition, controlled/uncontrolled state support, and web accessibility.

items.name: table
items.title: Table
items.description: Table component with subcomponents. Web: semantic HTML tables. Native: View-based approximation with limitations.

items.name: tabs
items.title: Tabs
items.description: A set of sections of content—known as tab panels—that are displayed one at a time.

items.name: textarea
items.title: Textarea
items.description: Multiline text input with Unistyles variants.

items.name: toast
items.title: Toast
items.description: A succinct message that is displayed temporarily.

items.name: toggle
items.title: Toggle
items.description: A two-state button that can be toggled on or off with support for controlled/uncontrolled state and aria-pressed on web.

items.name: toggle-group
items.title: Toggle Group
items.description: A set of two-state buttons that can be toggled on or off.

items.name: tokens
items.title: Tokens
items.description: Semantic tokens and Unistyles theme configuration.

items.name: tooltip
items.title: Tooltip
items.description: A popup that displays information related to an element when the element receives keyboard focus or the mouse hovers over it.

items.name: typography
items.title: Typography
items.description: Typography presets with Unistyles variants.
